functional.notes: Portal surfaces per-task quality audits and links them to a run.
evidence: apps/portal/pages/internal/intents/[intentId].js reads quality audit JSONs from status/audit/<intent>/runs/<runId>.
apps/portal/lib/portal_read_model.js loads run metadata and merges per-task status.
findings: UI can show missing vs pass vs fail per planned task.

correctness_safety.notes: Read model is deterministic and based on filesystem state.

performance.notes: Data volume is small (JSON files) and cached by Next.js server runtime.
findings: No expensive compute; mostly file reads.

security.notes: Internal portal; reads local generated/status files only.

maintainability.notes: Read model separates data loading from rendering.
findings: Clear extension point for future report types.

summary.notes: Good visibility; consider adding a small in-UI legend for audit status meanings.
